participant_1.background:
I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears.
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
I have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures.
both my parents were over 6 foot tall.
I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.

participant_2.background:
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
i live in a condo.
I am working too much and not spending enough time with my family.
my father and grandfather also worked in the circus.
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work at Sears, the only member of my family who does not work there. How about you?
I work from home, I have a crib in my office so I can keep an eye on my kid. I also have an old laptop that I use to read sci-fi space adventures.
That's awesome! I live in a condo, I'm working too much and not spending enough time with my family. I also have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not always the most graceful person, and I've had my fair share of bike crashes and nail polish disasters.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes. What's your favorite sci-fi space adventure novel?
I really like the Ender's Game series.
I've heard good things about those!
My dad and grandfather both worked in the circus, I always thought that was really cool.
That's awesome! I've always been interested in the circus, but I'm not sure if I'm coordinated enough to be a performer.
I'm not sure if I am either, but it would be fun to try!
Maybe we should start a circus family!
That would be so much fun!
